directions: In a silver julep cup or 10-ounce glass crush together with the back of a spoon the mint leaves, the sugar, and the water until the sugar is dissolved and fill the cup with the ice. Add the bourbon, stir the julep well, and garnish it with the mint sprig.
ingredients: 6 fresh mint leaves plus 1 mint sprig for garnish
1 teaspoon superfine sugar, or to taste
title: Mint Julep
